title: Chapter VII - Highways Designated For Use By Trucks, Tandem Trailers And Other Special Dimension Vehicles
content:
Chapter VII - Highways Designated For Use By Trucks, Tandem Trailers And Other Special Dimension Vehicles

State Regulations

Part 8000 - General Rules (ยง 8000.1 to 8000.7)

Subchapter A - Designated Qualifying Highways (Part 8001 to 8058)

Subchapter B - State Access Highways (Part 8101 to 8160)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
